comments: Material is taught straight from the book onto Powerpoint in Lecture. Outlines were passed out to go with the chapters in the book. Read your book, study the outlines & you will pass. Not crucial to have to attend every lecture, as it all comes directly from the text, but she helps clarify the info. Possible point deduction for poor attendance.

she is really nice and easy. but u still have to study.she mainly explains using power point. i would highly recommend taking her.i would not say that its important to go to lecture.but dont skip too much. never ever skip lab almost all who did ended up dropping out.

She was a pretty easy teacher, just pay attention you will do good. Tests were more than fair, tons of extra credit on them and she gives you a heads up to the extra credit is before the test and so you know going in. Take her
